name: Dog Walk King
description:
Controls:

Movement: Arrow Keys or WASD or Joystic

Run: Shift Key or Joystick primary button (A for Xbox, X for PS controller)

Goal:  To tame the wild beast that is the good boi doggo! 

Overview:   In Dog Walk King, you brave the unsafe streets to walk as many dogs as possible before time runs out.  But are you walking the dogs or are the dogs walking you???
